holidays.title: National Apple Day
holidays.description: Celebrate all things apple: apple pie, apple sauce, apple crisp… we could go on!

holidays.title: American Frog Day
holidays.description: Get out your vivariums as we celebrate this day with some great information!

holidays.title: Armed Forces Day in Honduras
holidays.description: Today, we honor the valiant Honduran soldiers who risk their lives for others’ safety.

holidays.title: ​Back to the Future Day
holidays.description: Throw on your Nikes, pop in a VHS and rev up your DeLorean.

holidays.title: Celebration of the Mind Day
holidays.description: Gear up for a day full of logic, learning, and fun — even with numbers involved!

holidays.title: Count Your Buttons Day
holidays.description: A fun day to celebrate this useful innovation that has made our clothes and lives beautiful.

holidays.title: Everyone Writes Day
holidays.description: Learn the history of writing and the best activities for Everyone Writes Day.

holidays.title: Global Iodine Deficiency Disorders Prevention Day
holidays.description: The day raises awareness about the importance of iodine and the disorders it prevents.

holidays.title: Hawke's Bay Anniversary Day
holidays.description: It marks the date when Hawke's Bay was separated from Auckland Province on November 1, 1858.

holidays.title: Honduran Army Day
holidays.description: An important symbol of Honduran unity is celebrated on this day. Join us in commemorating it!

holidays.title: International Day of the Nacho
holidays.description: You get permission to eat America’s favorite Tex-Mex treats for a full 24 hours!

holidays.title: Loud Shirt Day
holidays.description: Let’s all make some noise and get loud for Loud Shirt Day right!

holidays.title: National Alexander Day
holidays.description: It’s National Alexander Day. Let’s celebrate the people named after the great king of Macedonia.

holidays.title: National Archives Day
holidays.description: Take a look at the historical records as well as the preservation of such important information.

holidays.title: National Check Your Meds Day
holidays.description: It’s a rare chance for consumers to get free medical advice.

holidays.title: National Jameson Day
holidays.description: All James and Jamesons are honored on this day for being the greatest versions of themselves.

holidays.title: National Mammography Day
holidays.description: Early detection means early treatment and the difference between life and death.

holidays.title: National Pets for Veterans Day
holidays.description: It all started with a dog named Bear.

holidays.title: National Pumpkin Cheesecake Day
holidays.description: Pumpkin cheesecake is yet another way to win any American’s heart.

holidays.title: National Raymond Day
holidays.description: Today is your day to be treated like royalty! Think of it as your second birthday.

holidays.title: National Reptile Awareness Day
holidays.description: Godzilla. Reptar. The Geico Gecko. Those two lizards that always hang out around your back porch.

holidays.title: National Reptile Day
holidays.description: The squeamish and admirers alike appreciate the role these creatures play in our ecosystem.

holidays.title: Police Commemoration Day
holidays.description: Let us all come together to raise our hands and salute those who have served.

holidays.title: President Ndadaye's Day
holidays.description: Join us in honoring an unsung African hero who stood for the truth of democracy.

holidays.title: Sŵn Festival
holidays.description: Let us celebrate this year's Sŵn Festival with amazing music, fun, and activities.

holidays.title: Trafalgar Day
holidays.description: More than two centuries ago, the British Navy defeated French and Spanish ships at Trafalgar.

holidays.title: Aaron Tveit’s Birthday
holidays.description: The multitalented actor consistently demonstrates his acting and singing skills in many performances.

holidays.title: Amber Rose’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this star whose dance moves gave her an in into the entertainment business.

holidays.title: Carrie Fisher’s Birthday
holidays.description: This beauty left a lasting mark on the movie industry and a legacy that’ll live forever.

holidays.title: Celia Cruz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Through her music and style, Cruz has left an indelible mark on the entire world.

holidays.title: Cristy Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s talk about the “All Girls Garage” star Cristy Lee and her life journey.

holidays.title: Devyn Kohl’s Birthday
holidays.description: Beautiful and mesmerizing, this rising social media star will surely capture your heart!

holidays.title: Doja Cat’s Birthday
holidays.description: This amazing talent is on her way to building a strong reputation in the music world.

holidays.title: Hope Hicks’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hicks outlasted all of Trump’s inner circle to become his longest-serving political aide.

holidays.title: Judge Judy Sheindlin’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a tough one! Fully in charge of her courtroom where no crime goes unpunished.

holidays.title: Julia Havens’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her online journey sets an excellent example for fashion lovers and aspiring vloggers.

holidays.title: Kaleb Alva’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this rising TikTok star and soccer player, it is only the beginning.

holidays.title: Kane Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young singer is destined for success with his rich voice and talent.

holidays.title: Kaycee Rice’s Birthday
holidays.description: This performer is one big bundle of talent—an actress, businesswoman, choreographer, and personal trainer!

holidays.title: Kim Kardashian’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's the embodiment of the confident and smart woman's guide to self-belief with the Kim-K brand.

holidays.title: Marzia Kjellberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her personality and knowledge of beauty and fashion, she’s indeed one of the internet’s sweethearts.

holidays.title: Matt Carriker’s Birthday
holidays.description: As a YouTuber and a veterinarian, Matt has made it big like no other!

holidays.title: Tessica Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: She rose to stardom almost overnight and now stays at the top!

holidays.title: Yella Beezy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper is only just getting started and we’re here to celebrate.
